scripts.deploy:local: pnpm prepare:deploy mainnet && pnpm codegen && graph deploy metrom-curve-local --node http://localhost:8020 --ipfs http://localhost:5001 -l 0.0.1
scripts.deploy:bold-usdc:mainnet: pnpm prepare:deploy mainnet bold-usdc && pnpm codegen && graph deploy metrom-curve-bold-usdc-mainnet -l 0.0.2
scripts.deploy:ebusd-usdc:mainnet: pnpm prepare:deploy mainnet ebusd-usdc && pnpm codegen && graph deploy metrom-curve-ebusd-usdc-mainnet -l 0.0.1
